short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The social layer of the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn any webpage into a social hub with Poppin, the internet's first social extension!

With Poppin, you can:
📌 Comments & Conversations: Leave comments, reply to others, and upvote ideas—all right on the page.
💬 Real-Time Chat: Instantly chat with people visiting the same webpage as you.
🎙️ Live Voice Spaces: Join or host live audio discussions linked to specific webpages. Perfect for events, debates, or casual chats.
🌐 Universal Social Layer: Transform any website into a shared social experience.

Why Poppin?
🚀 Plug & Play: Works seamlessly with just one click.
🛡 Privacy First: We don’t store your browsing history. Your data stays safe and private.
🌍 Universal Compatibility: Whether you're browsing news, shopping, or exploring the web, Poppin works anywhere.

Streamline your online experience with Poppin—making the internet more social, one page at a time.
